title: Ranked Team Recruitment
body:
Hello Summoners,

Im from Adelaide currently in silver 2, was wondering if anyone would like to put together a team just for fun or to practice. If whole team is in Adelaide their is a few places we can go for fun tourneys. I can play any role but me and my mate usually play duo bot so we looking for 3 spots. Top/Jg/Mid although would prefer if you played more than 3 roles so we can all switch 

If you want to join just add me or post on this . Thanks for reading.

replies.body: I'm level 21 but I am a descent jungler and top laner. Please respond if you want me to join
I can play but live in NZ, am gold 3 and play mid, top and support

Hello there ciaô,

Just to be clear. Are you looking for Summoners that are exclusively from Adelaide or are you open to all regions of Oceania.
Secondly, I'll see if I can recruit you some members. Feel free to add me in-client and I'll see if I can help you.

Regards,
lols =)
